data.title: Giosue Carducci
data.meta_description: Sold for $481 | Influential Italian poet (1835–1907) regarded as the official national poet of modern Italy who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature
data.text: Influential Italian poet (1835–1907) regarded as the official national poet of modern Italy who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature in 1906. ALS in Italian, one page on a 5.5 x 3 postcard, July 6, 1891. Untranslated letter to Giovanni Gargiolli. In fine condition. RR Auction COA.
